title: New: Ryan Power – Mondo Rush
body:
You may remember, (depending on how much of a Joel Chima super fan you are), that I flipped my shit when I heard the debut single to come from [**Ryan Power**’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/14695-new-ryan-power-i-don%e2%80%99t-want-to-die/ "New: Ryan Power – I Don’t Want to Die") new LP, **_I Don’t want to Die_**. What grabbed me, amongst other things, were the track’s simplicities. The gentle and somber production allowed the lyrics and themes to gently soak in, leaving for a truly moving experience.

**Power**’s new track is quite the different beast. It trots along with flute like synths as its kitsch motivation, **Power**’s’ vocals again delivering in both range and frankly in weirdness.

_I Don’t Want to Die_ will be released April 3 by [NNA Tapes](http://nnatapes.com/).

Via [No Fear of Pop.](http://nofearofpop.net/2012/03/ryan-power-mondo-rush/)
